metadata.synopsis: A waveservant that is busy in the kitchen area of Water Queen's HouseAfter the Beastmaster quest is completed, the ceremony is no longer going on, so they have a different dialog then.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to CTY_Main_Agoto -260.453; 5.5; -251.7182. Talk to the waveservant

0.speaker: Untaken Padulla
0.text: Don't worry - the drinks'll be served with the food. Just wish Holli was here to enjoy them...
0.context: NodeContext: Preoccupied with preparing drinks; a little sad on the last sentence

1.speaker: Untaken Padulla
1.text: It was a lovely ceremony, wasn't it? Holli would've been touched.
1.context: NodeContext: Sentimental; a little sadder on the second sentence

2.speaker: Untaken Padulla
2.text: At least Holli's with Umberlee now.
2.context: NodeContext: Sadly (but pleased her friend's soul has moved on)

3.speaker: Untaken Padulla
3.text: Hands off the drinks. We have enough to fill Grey Harbour, but it's all for the funeral.
